name: km0
description:
Be a robot with two big laser guns, with no gfx at all! Cripple your friends shooting at their legs! Or shoot at their arms and make fun of them!

This is a very chaotic and prototipycal game, but it's functional.

Our objective was to build a game that was playable in LAN only, and we managed.
We also built a single player version to iterate on mechanics. There you have it.

In case you missed it: there is pretty much NO visual feedback about the mechanics. Don't get angry!
